name: Mod Your Pong
description:
As a part of 5th semester I run an internship for IdeeenLab. My assignment was to create game based around assets provided by users that would change the game. This is first prototype I made in few day, without option to adjust the spritesheets, but it has few built in to swap during the play.

This is created for 2 players, one player using WSAD, another arrows to control their pads.

This is the version I was allowed to publish.

Authors of the spritesheets:

Annouk van der Looij

Lin Neijndorff
